snippet.title: Deepak Fights Robots
snippet.description:
http://www.3dcartoongames.com/deepak-fights-robots/
Player guide a very normal diligent man Deepak who has to struggle to survive at his workplace, through colored platformer of psychedelic levels which feature obstacles to overcome and robo baddies to defeat. These robots are damaging, killing your animals, chasing you up. Our character can only run, jump to collect all flashing atoms and avoid robots. But when you succeed in collecting all atoms, a big power up will appears. When you eat it, you turn into a super hero in order to blast aggressive robots. These tough levels makes the game addicting, keep you return and give it a try again and again to perfect your skills, as well as your score.
